content: **materials ** ▪ dk weight yarn in yellow dark grey white ▪ c hook 2 75 mm ▪ stuffing ▪ scissors ▪ tapestry needle **difficulty ** easy you should know how to work in the round increase and decrease final piece should measure approximately 3 tall this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2017 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern luma belongs to nintendo
